dct_description_sm: United States Coast and Geodetic Survey ; from a trigonometrical survey under the direction of A.D. Bache, Superintendent of the Survey of the Coast of the United States ; triangulation by R.D. Cutts, G.A. Fairfield, G. Davidson, assists. and A.F. Rodgers, sub-assist. ; topography by R.D. Cutts, asst. & A.F. Rodgers, sub-asst. ; hydrography by the party under the command of Commander James Alden, U.S.N. assist.
Relief shown by hachures. Depths shown by soundings and shading.
"Redd. drng. by A. Lindenkohl, J.J. Ricketts & A. Balbach."
"Engd. by J. Knight, G.B. Metzeroth, A. Blondeau & W. Ogilvie."
"Electrotype copy no. 1 by G. Mathiot, U.S.C.S."
Inset map: Sub-sketch continuation of Straits of Karquines. Scale 1:50,000.
Inset views: View of the entrance to Karquines Straits and vicinity from near Penole Pt -- View of the entrance to San Francisco Bay from near Penole Pt.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Map Collections courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact Branner Earth Sciences Library & Map Collections at brannerlibrary@stanford.edu.
